article_title: Walmart Health Insurance Could Leave A Really Sick Worker Broke

article_metadata.description: Walmart made news recently when it eliminated healthcare insurance for its temporary workers. Only 30,000 out of approximately 1.4 million U.S. employees were affected, according to the company, because only that many part-time workers were receiving insurance benefits. However, details about the insurance programs provided by Walmart suggest that a bigger [...]
